title: Network Credentials
content: (If you were enrolled in DUO authentication, follow the instructions to complete the DUO authentication process.)

title: CalState LA Elections Menu
content: Click on the CalState LA Elections menu item below.
alt: cal state la elections menu items

title: Voting Options
content: This brings up the Voting Options shown below.

title: Summary Page
content: Click on the CalStateLA Voting Summary page.
For more information on the Candidates visit: http://www.calstatela.edu/asi/elections

title: Office Vote
content: Once ready to vote, click on the office you would like to vote for.
This will take you to the screen below which displays the candidates competing for the selected office.

title: Elect Candidate
content: Next, click on the Elect button for the chosen candidate.
alt: checked box next to chosen candidate

title: Voting Status
content: Then, click on the Vote button. Voting status will change from Not Voted to Voted.
Repeat the process for all offices that have candidates up for election.
Once you have voted, you will not be able to change your selection.
alt: Voting status summary for respective positions

title: Choosing a Representative
content: You can choose a representative for your respective college.
Example: If you are student of the College of Natural and Social Sciences then you will be able to vote for the representative from your college.
alt: Options for representatives for respective colleges

title: Board of Directors
content: You can select and vote for up to 8 candidates.
alt: Board of directors voting with up to 8 options

title: Too Many Votes
content: If you vote for more than eight candidates you will get the following error:
alt: Error message if voting for more than 8 candidates

title: No Votes
content: If you select no candidates you will get the following error:
alt: Error message if you neglect to select any candidates
